cause.description:
Giving our troops who fight for our freedom on a daily basis the support they need, whether or not you agree with the war, but they are fighting for our freedom and sadly, dying everyday for us.
In 1984, then-President Ronald Reagan proclaimed the Friday before Mother’s Day to be designated as Military Spouse Appreciation Day.
If you don't stand behind them, feel free to stand in front of them.
Semper Fi
1. Support until they all come home
2. Support for those who haven't made it
3. Support after they all come home
cause.mission: support our troops whether or not you support the cause
cause.name: Support Our Troops
